name: Block Breaker (Tihami)
description:
Welcome to Block Breaker an arcade style game with a variety of level layouts and visual effects. Currently there are 5 playable levels, you have one life to clear them all. If you die you restart from level 1. Do you think you can clear all 5 levels ?  Well... lets find out.

New levels coming soon. If you reach level 5 then don't forget to tweet at me with a screen-shot. If you have any bug reports, level ideas or inquiries comment it down bellow or message me on social media.

Version 0.1

SOCIAL MEDIA - Instagram, Twitter
